stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1 credit if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1[credit] if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.
title: System Outage
